# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This lab notebook is a collaborative effort by all size ecology lab members led by [Prof Julia Blanchard](https://www.utas.edu.au/profiles/staff/imas/julia-blanchard) at the [Institute for Marine and Antarctic Studies](https://www.imas.utas.edu.au/), [University of Tasmania](https://www.utas.edu.au/).
This lab notebook includes information on lab meetings, administration, data-storage, open data-science, R programming, Mizer R package, writing skills and GitHub.
